layout.structure: Fixed left sidebar (filters) + Infinite Scroll Masonry Grid (main)

search_bar.style: Massive, central input. No borders, just bottom border or minimal container.
search_bar.interaction: Expands on focus. Moves to top sticky header on scroll.
search_bar.classes: h-14 bg-surface border-border focus:ring-0 focus:border-white transition-all duration-300

image_card.style: Borderless. Image is hero. Metadata appears on hover only.
image_card.hover_effect: group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/90 via-black/40 to-transparent
image_card.actions: Download button (white pill), Like button (icon only), Info button

filters.style: Sidebar vertical list. Minimal checkboxes. 'Mono' font for counts.
filters.badges: Source badges (Unsplash, Pexels) should be text-only or simple icons, no colorful logos.

modal.style: Immersive Lightbox. 90% viewport height image. Side panel for details.

icons.usage: Use specific brand icons for source filters. Use Lucide-react for UI icons (download, search, close).

images.placeholders: Use 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-...' for mock data if API fails.
images.logo_strategy: Use text logo 'LUMINA' in 'JetBrains Mono' font. Tracking-widest.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Configure Tailwind for Dark Mode. Update index.css with the 'Obsidian' palette variables.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Create the Layout Shell: Sidebar (Left) + Main Content (Right).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Implement the Search Header. It must feel 'expensive' (smooth transitions).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the Masonry Grid. Ensure images load gracefully (blur-up effect).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Develop the Image Modal. It must handle high-res images without layout shift.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Add 'data-testid' to ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
instructions_to_main_agent.critical_rule: NO VIBRANT COLORS. The interface is the frame, the content is the art. Use greyscale only.

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties (opacity, transform).
Ensure text contrast meets APCA standards (Light Grey on Dark Grey).
Avoid generic 'card' look. Use 'surface' colors with subtle borders.
Typography hierarchy: Headings = Manrope, Meta Data = JetBrains Mono.
